dict.string: This is Pescatarian Egg Free Breakfast 1

Ingredients:
1. ⅓ cup of oats, 1 tablespoon raisins, 1 tablespoon almond butter or peanut butter 2. 2 tablespoon Applesauce, ⅓ cup milk of choice, Chopped almonds, Drizzle of honey
Recipe: 1. In a bowl, combine the oats, raisins, and applesauce. Stir. Then add milk and stir.
2. Place the lid on the bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 5 days. When you’re ready to serve

Ingredients: 1 slice of bread, ½ ripe avocado, Pinch of salt
Recipe:
1. Toast your slice of bread until golden and firm.
2. Remove the pit from your avocado. Use a big spoon to scoop out the flesh. 3. Put it in a bowl and mash it up until smooth. Mix in a pinch of salt 4. Spread avocado on top of your toast. Enjoy

Ingredients:
1. 2 small carrots , peeled and grated, 180g porridge oats, 75g raisins 2. 1 tsp cinnamon, grating of fresh nutmeg, 850ml milk, 1 tbsp nut butter, honey
Recipe:
1. Put all the ingredients apart from the honey in a pan and cook over a medium heat for 10-15 mins 2. Add a little more milk as it cooks if it’s too thick. Serve with a splash more milk and a drizzle of honey,

Ingredients:
1. 2 tbsp chia seeds, 125ml oat milk (or milk of your choice) 2. 2 tsp maple syrup, fruit, such as berries, banana, kiwis or mango, to serve
Recipe:
1. Combine the chia seeds, milk and 2 tsp maple syrup in a jar or bowl. Cover and chill overnight or for at least 8 hrs. 2. When ready to serve, top with fruit and a drizzle of maple syrup.
